metadata.name: Taskmgr as LOCAL_SYSTEM
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of taskmgr.exe process in context of LOCAL_SYSTEM

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(actor.user.name), lower('authori')) OR contains(lower(actor.user.name), lower('autori'))) AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\taskmgr.exe')))

output.summary: Detects the creation of taskmgr.exe process in context of LOCAL_SYSTEM
